meanings: release[post] the identities of sexual offenders

vlive.korean: 범죄자 같은 느낌? Like you're a criminal? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
훔쳐 간 사람이 범죄자 아니야! You're a criminal! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.23 TTT #3 (Camping Ver.)
"당신은 범죄자입니다 내 마음을 악당..." "You're a criminal to steal my heart". 듣기 View video iKON : 송&동
vlive.english: "You're a criminal to steal my heart".

vlive.korean: 그러고서 자기를 팬? 팬이라 불러? 그런 사람들은 다 범죄자야! and then, call themselves fans? They are fans? They are criminals!! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 오늘 내 마음을 전달할거야 [7일만 로맨스] EP09 고백이 실패하는 이유
vlive.english: and then, call themselves fans? They are fans? They are criminals!!

vlive.korean: [동동이는 범죄자야... 살인 미소...] [아니 윙크하고 그렇게 웃으면...] [Dong Hyun is a criminal... Killer smile...] [If you wink and smile like that...] View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 1ST FANMEETING BEHIND IN THAILAND
vlive.english: [Dong Hyun is a criminal... Killer smile...] [If you wink and smile like that...]

examples.korean: Criminals could at one time be sentenced to penal servitude. 발음듣기 과거에는 범죄자들이 강제노역형을 선고받을 수도 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Criminals could at one time be sentenced to penal servitude. 발음

examples.korean: public enemy number one 발음듣기 가장 흉악한 범죄자[가장 큰 사회적 위험] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Purposeful work is an important part of the regime for young offenders. 발음듣기 목적의식을 갖고 하는 근로는 젊은 범죄자들 관리 체제에서 중요한 부분이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Purposeful work is an important part of the regime for young offenders. 발음

examples.korean: a secure unit for child offenders 발음듣기 보안이 철저한 아동 범죄자들용 건물 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a secure unit for child offenders 발음

examples.korean: This man is known to the police. 발음듣기 이 남자는 경찰에 (범죄자로) 알려져 있는 인물이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This man is known to the police. 발음
